
Ingredients of Insanity

This game was created with love by Simon (zirconcode) and Spargles for the LudumDare 40 (Jam).

Instructions in game =)

Enjoy!

Created Using:

We used Tiled (www.mapeditor.org) as a map editor, thank you Thorbj√∏rn Lindeijer and others for this wonderful and simple editor.
